3590.example_1: atthaṅ'gate atthaṅgatasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa. atthaṅ'gate vematiko ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa. atthaṅ'gate anatthaṅgatasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

3589.grammar: pp of na atthaṃ gacchati, comp
3589.meaning_1: (of the sun) not set; not gone down

9656.construction: na > a + saṃ + vi + daha + ita

9657.meaning_1: perceiving as not arranged; regarding (something) as not organised
9657.example_1: asaṃvidahite vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. asaṃvidahite asaṃvidahitasaññī, anāpatti.

9658.meaning_1: having not arranged; having not organised; having not planned
9658.construction:
na > a + saṃ + vi + daha + itvā
na + saṃvidahitvā
9658.example_1: anāpatti samaye, asaṃvidahitvā gacchati, bhikkhunī saṃvidahati, bhikkhu na saṃvidahati, visaṅketena gacchanti, āpadāsu, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

69104.meaning_1: not in line with agreement; not according arrangement
69104.example_1: anāpatti samaye, asaṃvidahitvā gacchati, bhikkhunī saṃvidahati, bhikkhu na saṃvidahati, visaṅketena gacchanti, āpadāsu, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

1952.example_1: dhammo, ānanda, pāsādo puratthimena pacchimena ca yojanaṃ āyāmena ahosi. uttarena dakkhiṇena ca aḍḍhayojanaṃ vitthārena.
1952.example_2: kukkuṭasampāte gāme, gām'antare gām'antare āpatti pācittiyassa. agāmake araññe, aḍḍhayojane aḍḍhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.

6369.meaning_1: not organized; not arranged; not brought to fruition (by)
6369.example_1: aparipācite paripācitasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. aparipācitte vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. aparipācite aparipācitasaññī, anāpatti.

6370.meaning_1: perceiving as not organized; regarding (something) as not arranged
6370.example_1: aparipācite paripācitasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. aparipācitte vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. aparipācite aparipācitasaññī, anāpatti.

43641.example_1: aparipācite paripācitasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. aparipācitte vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. aparipācite aparipācitasaññī, anāpatti.

1597.meaning_1: engaged with something else; preoccupied with something else
1597.meaning_2: being occupied with something else, distracted
1597.example_1: anāpatti yo koci viññū dutiyo hoti, tiṭṭhati na nisīdati, araho'pekkho, aññavihito nisīdati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

69720.example_1: anāpatti yo koci viññū dutiyo hoti, tiṭṭhati na nisīdati, araho'pekkho, aññavihito nisīdati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

551.example_1: agilāno agilānasaññī tat'uttari āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa. agilāno vematiko tat'uttari āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

24973.example_1: agilāno vematiko tat'uttari āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa. agilāno gilānasaññī tat'uttariṃ āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
24973.commentary: (KVt) gilānassa gilānasaññino'ti gilānassa pana gilāno ahan'ti saññino anuvasitvā bhuñjantassa anāpatti.

37751.meaning_1: having invited; having made an offer
37751.example_1: nibaddhaṃ mama gehaṃ pavisatha, aham'eva catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahissāmī'ti theraṃ nimantetvā pakkāmi.
37751.example_2: anāpatti gilānassa, agilāno sakiṃ bhuñjati, gacchanto, vā āgacchanto vā bhuñjati, sāmikā nimantetvā bhojenti, odissa paññatto hoti, na yāva'd'attho paññatto hoti, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpatti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

50405.example_1: bhikkhū pana mayaṃ, bhante, ājānīy'eva samāne ājānīyā'ti jānissāma ājānīy'eva samāne ājānīyabhojanaṃ bhojessāma, ājānīy'eva samāne ājānīyaṭhāne ṭhapessāma.
50405.example_2: anāpatti gilānassa, agilāno sakiṃ bhuñjati, gacchanto, vā āgacchanto vā bhuñjati, sāmikā nimantetvā bhojenti, odissa paññatto hoti, na yāva'd'attho paññatto hoti, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpatti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

18637.example_1: anāpatti gilānassa, agilāno sakiṃ bhuñjati, gacchanto, vā āgacchanto vā bhuñjati, sāmikā nimantetvā bhojenti, odissa paññatto hoti, na yāva'd'attho paññatto hoti, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpatti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

35402.meaning_1: not a group meal; not eating in a group
35402.example_1: nagaṇabhojane gaṇabhojanasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nagaṇabhojane vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nagaṇabhojane nagaṇabhojanasaññī, anāpatti.

24095.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as eating in a group
24095.example_1: nagaṇabhojane gaṇabhojanasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nagaṇabhojane vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nagaṇabhojane nagaṇabhojanasaññī, anāpatti.

35403.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as not eating in a group
35403.example_1: nagaṇabhojane gaṇabhojanasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nagaṇabhojane vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nagaṇabhojane nagaṇabhojanasaññī, anāpatti.

36987.example_1: anāpatti samaye, dve tayo ekato bhuñjanti, piṇḍāya caritvā ekato sannipatitvā bhuñjanti, niccabhattaṃ, salākabhattaṃ, pakkhikaṃ, uposathikaṃ, pāṭipadikaṃ, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpatti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
36987.commentary: (VSa) niccabhattan'ti dhuvabhattaṃ vuccati, niccabhattaṃ gaṇhathā'ti vadanti, bahūnaṃ ekato gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.

61142.example_1: anāpatti samaye, dve tayo ekato bhuñjanti, piṇḍāya caritvā ekato sannipatitvā bhuñjanti, niccabhattaṃ, salākabhattaṃ, pakkhikaṃ, uposathikaṃ, pāṭipadikaṃ, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpatti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

39142.example_1: anāpatti samaye, dve tayo ekato bhuñjanti, piṇḍāya caritvā ekato sannipatitvā bhuñjanti, niccabhattaṃ, salākabhattaṃ, pakkhikaṃ, uposathikaṃ, pāṭipadikaṃ, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpatti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

45321.meaning_1: (meal offered) on the day following the observance day
45321.example_1: anāpatti samaye, dve tayo ekato bhuñjanti, piṇḍāya caritvā ekato sannipatitvā bhuñjanti, niccabhattaṃ, salākabhattaṃ, pakkhikaṃ, uposathikaṃ, pāṭipadikaṃ, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpatti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

39634.meaning_1: monk who walks behind; accompanying monk
39634.meaning_2: junior monk who walks behind a senior on his rounds
39634.example_1: atha kho, pāpima, kakusandho bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pubb'aṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaram'ādāya āyasmatā vidhurena pacchāsamaṇena gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
39634.example_2: atha kho bhagavā pubb'aṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaram'ādāya āyasmatā ānandena pacchāsamaṇena yena aññataraṃ kulaṃ ten'upasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.

49297.example_1: aññataro bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ ādāya yena so bhikkhu ten'upasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca, bhuñjāhi, āvuso'ti. alaṃ, āvuso, atthi me bhattapaccāsā'ti. tassa bhikkhuno piṇḍapāto ussūre āharīyittha.

35692.meaning_1: not a meal in succession; not eating one meal before the other
35692.example_1: naparamparabhojane paramparabhojanasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. naparamparabhojane vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. naparamparabhojane naparamparabhojanasaññī, anāpatti.

43013.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as eating one meal after the other
43013.example_1: naparamparabhojane paramparabhojanasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. naparamparabhojane vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. naparamparabhojane naparamparabhojanasaññī, anāpatti.

35693.meaning_1: perceiving (oneself) as not eating one meal after the other
35693.example_1: naparamparabhojane paramparabhojanasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. naparamparabhojane vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. naparamparabhojane naparamparabhojanasaññī, anāpatti.

37740.example_1: seyyath'idaṃ, nando vaccho, kiso saṃkicco, makkhali gosālo, etehi, bho gotama, acelakā mutt'ācārā hatth'āpalekhanā naehibhaddantikā natiṭṭhabhaddantikā na abhihaṭaṃ na uddissakataṃ na nimantanaṃ sādiyanti
37740.example_2: anāpatti samaye, vikappetvā bhuñjati, dve tayo nimantane ekato bhuñjati, nimantanapaṭipāṭiyā bhuñjati, sakalena gāmena nimantito tasmiṃ gāme yattha katthaci bhuñjati, sakalena pūgena nimantito tasmiṃ pūge yattha katthaci bhuñjati
37740.commentary: (DNa) na nimantanan'ti asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ vā vīthiṃ vā gāmaṃ vā paviseyyāthā'ti evaṃ nimantitabhikkham'pi na sādiyati, na gaṇhāti.

37742.example_1: anāpatti samaye, vikappetvā bhuñjati, dve tayo nimantane ekato bhuñjati, nimantanapaṭipāṭiyā bhuñjati, sakalena gāmena nimantito tasmiṃ gāme yattha katthaci bhuñjati, sakalena pūgena nimantito tasmiṃ pūge yattha katthaci bhuñjati

37748.example_1: santi kho pana me, udāyi, sāvakā piṇḍapātikā sapadānacārino uñch'āsake vate ratā, te antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhā samānā āsanena'pi nimantiyamānā na sādiyanti.
37748.example_2: nimantiyamāno bhikkhaṃ gahessāmī'ti bhaṇati, niccabhatte, salākabhatte, pakkhike, uposathike, pāṭipadike, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpatti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

40749.example_1: paheṇak'atthāya vā pātheyy'atthāya vā paṭiyattasesakaṃ denti, gamane paṭippassaddhe denti, ñātakānaṃ pavāritānaṃ, aññass'atthāya, attano dhanena, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

9180.example_1: anatirittaṃ nāma akappiyakataṃ hoti, appaṭiggahitakataṃ hoti, anuccāritakataṃ hoti, ahatthapāse kataṃ hoti, abhuttāvinā kataṃ hoti, bhuttāvinā pavāritena āsanā vuṭṭhitena kataṃ hoti, alam'etaṃ sabban'ti avuttaṃ hoti, na gilān'ātirittaṃ hoti, etaṃ anatirittaṃ nāma.

3541.example_1: ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti dukkaṭassa. atiritte anatirittasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. atiritte vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

2272.example_1: anatiritte vematiko khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa. anatiritte atirittasaññī khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.

13233.meaning_1: for food; for the purpose of eating
13233.example_1: yāmakālikaṃ satt'āhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti dukkaṭassa.

44921.example_1: appavārite pavāritasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. appavārite vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. appavārite appavāritasaññī, anāpatti.

7058.example_1: appavārite pavāritasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. appavārite vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. appavārite appavāritasaññī, anāpatti.

67167.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as the wrong time; regarding it as after midday
67167.example_1: vikāle vikālasaññī khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa. vikāle vematiko khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.

21444.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as the right time; regarding it as before midday
21444.example_1: vikāle vematiko khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa. vikāle kālasaññī khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.

6811.meaning_1: perceiving as not formally accepted; regarding (something) as not received
6811.example_1: appaṭiggahitake appaṭiggahitakasaññī adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhāreti, aññatra udakadantaponā, āpatti pācittiyassa.

40330.meaning_1: perceiving as formally accepted; regarding (something) as received
40330.example_1: paṭiggahitake vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. paṭiggahitake paṭiggahitakasaññī, anāpatti.

40328.meaning_1: (vinaya) formally accepted; received by a monastic

52023.example_1: anāpatti udakadantapone, cattāri mahāvikatāni sati paccaye asati kappiyakārake sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
52023.commentary: (VMVt) apakatibhesajjattā vikaṭāni virūpāni visaharaṇato mahāvisayattā mahantāni cā'ti mahāvikaṭāni. (KVt) cattāri mahāvikaṭānī'ti gūthaṃ, muttaṃ, chārikā, mattikā ca āsayādi-vasena virūpāni jātānī'ti katvā vikaṭānī'ti vā apakatibhojanattā vikaṭāni virūpāni jātānī'ti vā attho.
